name: undeservedly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is not right or that someone does not deserve: No book has been more undeservedly neglected by critics. Sports stars are all too often put on pedestals undeservedly.
More examplesFewer examplesThis great little show has been undeservedly ignored.It seemed that he had undeservedly passed an examination which he hadn't even known he was taking. He has undeservedly gained the reputation of being a soft liberal.I feel most undeservedly honoured.They have suffered undeservedly.
